\section{Namespace List}
Here is a list of all documented namespaces with brief descriptions\-:\begin{DoxyCompactList}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos}{chaos} \\*Global Chaos\-Core namespace which contains everything within Chaos\-Core }{\pageref{namespacechaos}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1clock}{chaos\-::clock} \\*Module for querying and measuring time }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1clock}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1data}{chaos\-::data} \\*Module for dealing with low-\/level data }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1data}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1ex}{chaos\-::ex} \\*Base generic exceptions defined by Chaos\-Core }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1ex}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1gfx}{chaos\-::gfx} \\*Utility operations and classes relating to computer graphics }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1gfx}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1io}{chaos\-::io} \\*Input/\-Output related classes and operations }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1io}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1io_1_1format}{chaos\-::io\-::format} \\*Classes and operations related to formatting }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1io_1_1format}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1io_1_1sys}{chaos\-::io\-::sys} \\*Module for File System operations }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1io_1_1sys}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1literal}{chaos\-::literal} \\*User defined literal operators for Chaos\-Core }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1literal}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1math}{chaos\-::math} \\*Math related classes and operations }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1math}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1os}{chaos\-::os} \\*Module operating system related actions }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1os}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1test}{chaos\-::test} \\*Chaos\-Core's testing module }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1test}}{}
\item\contentsline{section}{\hyperlink{namespacechaos_1_1uni}{chaos\-::uni} \\*Module for Unicode related classes and operations }{\pageref{namespacechaos_1_1uni}}{}
\end{DoxyCompactList}
